If WatchActivity\u0027s surface\nhas not been ready yet, ffplayer will receive an error that decoder\ncould not be opened. Currently ffplayer\u0027s behavior is to\nunderstand this effect as an error and finish itself, which is not.\nThis patch changes ffplayer\u0027s behavior to re-try to configure\nthe video by re-opening the video stream if previous was\nunsuccessfull. This will fix not only the invalid file to\nplay but some full-seg bad behavior when trying to open HD\nstreams when signal is not good.\n\nChange-Id:
